text: John W. Mannion (born July 8, 1968) is an American educator and politician. He has been the U.S. representative from New York's 22nd congressional district since 2025. Before, he was a state senator from the 50th district between 2020 and 2024. Before entering politics, Mannion was a high school biology teacher. ==References== ==Other websites== * Campaign website * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Politicians from Syracuse, New York Category:Educators from New York (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Mannion
